rules.name: gap_inside
rules.title: Gap (inside)
rules.description: Gap: Is there anyone in my Gap (inside, closest to the ball)?

rules.name: on_me
rules.title: On me
rules.description: On me: Is there anyone On me (right across from me)?

rules.name: linebacker
rules.title: Linebacker
rules.description: Linebacker: Is there a Linebacker to block?

rules.name: destroy_nearest
rules.title: Destroy (Playside)
rules.description: Destroy Playside: Is there anyone Down the playside? (the 'right' part of this call)
